content: cable pattern 5 th row of the leg *cross 3r the last 3 sts of needle 4 with the first 3 sts of needle 1 p2 cross 3r p2 cross 3r p2 cross 3r p2 cross 3 r p2 cross 3r p2 cross 3r p2 cross 3r p2 k3 knit the next 8 row as the sts show as first row of leg in cable pattern * continue from * to * two more times or as long as you wish your leg to be repeat 5th row of leg one more time then knit 4 row as the stitches show the heelflap place the sts of needle four and one on one needle and knit these 32 sts separately back and 2 forth without knitting the sts of needle two and three because i do not enjoy breaking the yarn and sewing in threads i usually join the sts this way when i come to the end of the row on needle four on my last row of the leg pattern i continue to knit the stitches of needle one onto needle four knit the heel flap like this ws slip the first st then purl all sts rs *slip 1 st k1* continue to the end of the row 32 sts knit as many row as your heel requires normally 2-2 5 inches/5-6 cm but this is individual turn the heel on a wrong side row this is to avoid breaking the yarn when joining the round later on ws slip the first st p 17 p2tog p1 turn work rs slip the first st k5 s1 k1 psso k1 turn work ws slip the first st purl until you reach the last stitch before visible gap between the stitches of the row close the gap with p2tog p1 turn work rs slip the first st knit until you reach the last stitch before the visible gap between the stitches of the row close the gap with s1 k1 psso k1 turn work continue these last 2 row until you no longer can knit/purl a stitch after decreasing/closing the gaps on both sides you now have 18 stitches on your needle instep gusset take another needle and pick up stitches on the right side of your heelflap needle until you reach needle 2 it is individual how many stitches you have to pick up according to the length of your heelflap count the number of your heelflap row and divide by two then you have the number of stitches you have to pick up make sure that the last stitch you pick up is picked up after the heelflap row in the corner of needle two so you do not get a hole in the corner knit needle two and three as the stitches show in cable pattern take another needle and pick up the same number of stitches alongside the other side of the heelflap as you did before make sure that the first stitch is picked
